vsParam:
Look carefully at the top left corner.
There are two categories, [c][DF1FB2FF]Manual[-][/c] and [c][009C8CFF]Auto[-][/c].

①[c][DF1FB2FF]Manual[-][/c] Items can be
　[c][DF1FB2FF]used freely in battles[-][/c].

②[c][009C8CFF]Auto[-][/c] Items can [c][009C8CFF]be used with a certain chance
　only when there is a character with the auto item ability[-][/c].

For this time, equip an item in the [c][DF1FB2FF]Manual slot[-][/c].
[c][DF1FB2FF]You can use it at any time during battles[-][/c].
First, tap on the empty item slot.
